mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveSubjectInformationList */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , A.CLS_INFO_ID AS "classInfoID" , A.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.C_YEAR AS "year" , A.SEMESTER AS "semester" , B.SUB_ID AS "subjectID" , B.SUB_NM AS "subjectName" , B.SUB_DESC AS "subjectDesc" , B.STCD AS "statusCode" , B.FRST_REG_DT AS "firstRegisterDate" , B.FRST_REG_TIME AS "firstRegisterTime" , B.LAST_CHNG_DT AS "lastChangeDate" , B.LAST_CHNG_TIME AS "lastChangeTime" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A LEFT JOIN FRST.SUBJ_INFO B ON A.CLS_INFO_ID = B.CLS_INFO_ID AND B.STCD <> '02' WHERE ('' = COALESCE(#{classInfoID}, '') OR A.CLS_INFO_ID = #{classInfoID}) AND (B.SUB_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR B.SUB_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND A.STCD <> '02' ORDER BY A.C_YEAR DESC , A.SEMESTER DESC , A.CLS_ID DESC , B.SUB_ID , B.STCD

SELECT /* RetrieveSubjectInformationListForDownload */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , A.CLS_INFO_ID AS "classInfoID" , A.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.C_YEAR AS "year" , A.SEMESTER AS "semester" , B.SUB_ID AS "subjectID" , B.SUB_NM AS "subjectName" , B.SUB_DESC AS "subjectDesc" , B.STCD AS "statusCode" , B.FRST_REG_DT AS "firstRegisterDate" , B.FRST_REG_TIME AS "firstRegisterTime" , B.LAST_CHNG_DT AS "lastChangeDate" , B.LAST_CHNG_TIME AS "lastChangeTime" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A LEFT JOIN FRST.SUBJ_INFO B ON A.CLS_INFO_ID = B.CLS_INFO_ID AND B.STCD <> '02' WHERE ('' = COALESCE(#{classInfoID}, '') OR A.CLS_INFO_ID = #{classInfoID}) AND (B.SUB_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR B.SUB_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND A.STCD <> '02' ORDER BY A.C_YEAR DESC , A.SEMESTER DESC , A.CLS_ID DESC , B.SUB_ID , B.STCD

SELECT /* RetrieveSubjectIsExist */ CLS_INFO_ID AS "classID" , SUB_ID AS "subjectID" , SUB_NM AS "subjectName" , SUB_DESC AS "subjectDesc" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.SUBJ_INFO WHERE CLS_INFO_ID = #{classID} AND ('' = COALESCE(#{subjectID}, '') OR SUB_ID = #{subjectID}) AND STCD <> '02' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterSubjectInformation */ INTO FRST.SUBJ_INFO ( CLS_INFO_ID , SUB_ID , SUB_NM , SUB_DESC , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{classID} , #{subjectID} , COALESCE(#{subjectName}, '') , COALESCE(#{subjectDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateSubjectInformation */ FRST.SUBJ_INFO SET SUB_NM = COALESCE(#{subjectName}, SUB_NM) , SUB_DESC = COALESCE(#{subjectDesc}, SUB_DESC) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE CLS_INFO_ID = #{classID} AND SUB_ID = #{subjectID}
